sentences: Wang Ji-won (born November 12, 1988) is a South Korean actress and ballet dancer.
Wang trained with the Royal Ballet School in England and studied Dance at the Korea National University of Arts, she was a member of the Korea National Ballet in 2009.
Wang began acting in 2012 and has appeared in television dramas, notably I Need Romance 3 and You Are My Destiny.
In December 2018, Wang signed with YG Entertainment.
On January 20, 2022 it was confirmed that Wang is preparing for marriage with Park Jong-suk, a South Korean ballerino.
